author: tristan_wilson
content: I am using blob-utils to spam blobs against my local geth/prysm devnet, and I am finding that geth is making blocks that only include 3 blob txs instead of 6... there are definitely backlogged blob txs in the geth mempool to build a block with 6 since I am spamming from two accounts and both are getting "account limit exceeded: pooled 16 txs"

author: __flcl
content: Not a single 6-blobs block at the beginning?
